summary: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a conservative accountant enlists the help of an exotic dancer to guide him on a quest for sexual experience, leading him into a world of strip clubs, sensual massage parlors, cross-dressing and S & M.
cast: Jonas Chernick|Emily Hampshire|Sarah Manninen|Vik Sahay|Melissa Marie Elias|Marina Stephenson Kerr|Mike Bell|Andrea del Campo|Onalee Ames|Randy Apostle|Dean Harder|Tamara Gorski|Sarah Constible|Jessica Burleson|Stephen Eric McIntyre|Gordon Tanner|Curt Keilback|Ryan Miller|Adrian McLean|Alan Castanaga|Steed Crandell|Aisha Alfa|Andrew Johnson|Laura Olafson|Matthew Stefanson|Robert Kostyra|Adam McCort|Gord Pankhurst|Lorrie Papadopoulos|Satara Subedar|Teegan Weiske
title: Mi gran aventura sexual
